resources.string: An app that launches K천nele on Android Things

Press the button connected to BCM4 on your GPIO board to launch K천nele. 
Launching the recognizer immediately from adb:
 "adb shell am start -n ee.ioc.phon.android.things.k6nelelauncher/.ActivityLauncherActivity --ez auto_start true" 
Using another button:
 "adb shell am start -n ee.ioc.phon.android.things.k6nelelauncher/.ActivityLauncherActivity -e gpio_button BCM4" 
or (if you have a mouse and a monitor) then press this button.
